title: Only on the Rhine
text:
Only on the Rhine () is a 1930 German <a href="comedy%20film">comedy film</a> directed by <a href="Max%20Mack">Max Mack</a> and starring <a href="Daisy%20D%27Ora">Daisy D'Ora</a>, <a href="Igo%20Sym">Igo Sym</a>, and <a href="Truus%20Van%20Aalten">Truus Van Aalten</a>.
The film's sets were designed by <a href="Otto%20Erdmann%20%28art%20director%29">Otto Erdmann</a> and <a href="Hans%20Sohnle">Hans Sohnle</a>. Some <a href="location%20filming">location filming</a> took place at <a href="Bacharach">Bacharach</a> and <a href="Koblenz">Koblenz</a> on the river <a href="Rhine">Rhine</a>.
